page.title: 02EDUCATION ON RAASAY
page.content: THERE IS ONLY ONE PRIMARY SCHOOL ON RAASAY AND YOU START SCHOOL AT THE AGE OF 4 AND A HALF TO FIVE AND A HALF.YOU LEAVE SCHOOL WHEN YOU ARE BETWEEN 11-12 YEARS OF AGE AND SINCE THERE IS NO SECONDARY SCHOOL ON THE ISLAND YOU GO TO PORTREE FOR 4-6 YEARS.THE PRIMARY SCHOOL IS SMALLER THAN THE SECONDARY SCHOOL AND THERE ARE 11 PUPILS IN IT AND 1 TEACHER AND A COOK. THERE ARE PRIMARYS 1-7 IN THE SCHOOL AND WE HAVE A VISITING GEALIC TEACHER WHO IS CALLED MRS.SINCLAIR AND SHE COMES OVER TO RAASAY EVERY MONDAY AFTERNOON ON THE 12.30.FERRY.IN THE WINTER THERE ARE EVENING CLASSES SUCH AS GEALIC,GEALIC SINGING AND HANDICRAFT AND SEWING WHICH ARE HELD IN THE SCHOOL FOR THE ADULTS.
